paragraphs.name: ca57
paragraphs.text: All I know is that I am terrified

aac2ef358526.title: oh, I so feel this from your words.

paragraphs.text: oh, I so feel this from your words.
I agree with Sth Pya. I thought I was reading my own thoughts. Vulnerability is its own reward. Keep on sharing.
paragraphs.name: 32e6

paragraphs.text: Thank you, I do my best, which is often — and you know that — not always enough.
paragraphs.name: ea08

virtuals.subtitle: Thank you, I do my best, which is often — and you know that — not always enough.

content.subtitle: Thank you, I do my best, which is often — and you know that — not always enough.

ed675dd0d105.title: Pierre, you always have the perfect words to soothe an aching heart.

paragraphs.text: Pierre, you always have the perfect words to soothe an aching heart.
paragraphs.name: 649f

4d08523317f2.title: sincere apologies, what could be more beautiful, they are honest.

paragraphs.text: sincere apologies, what could be more beautiful, they are honest.
paragraphs.name: d97f

a801ea321d1f.title: Why does it seem like we spend more time apologizing than anything else?

paragraphs.text: Why does it seem like we spend more time apologizing than anything else? We start apologizing for apologizing!
paragraphs.name: 1bcf

paragraphs.text: Once the sincere apologies are through, I hope you find the strength, the strength you already have inside, to come out of hiding and give it your best again!
And maybe I’ll crawl out and stop apologizing profusely myself…There will be more parties.
paragraphs.name: ebf2

virtuals.subtitle: Once the sincere apologies are through, I hope you find the strength, the strength you already have inside, to come out of hiding and give…

content.subtitle: Once the sincere apologies are through, I hope you find the strength, the strength you already have inside, to come out of hiding and give…

19864128884b.title: Do not hide — you are beautiful

paragraphs.text: Do not hide — you are beautiful
paragraphs.name: 1a25

e5b192972922.title: Seemingly simple words but so eloquent.

paragraphs.text: Seemingly simple words but so eloquent.
paragraphs.name: 36fe

73b6be7c2657.title: You write wonderful poetries. So meaningful. Shows the hidden pain.

paragraphs.text: You write wonderful poetries. So meaningful. Shows the hidden pain.
paragraphs.name: b80b

paragraphs.text: No, I already ruined the party
paragraphs.name: aa5b

paragraphs.text: Please, stay. Take my hand. It might take a few minutes, but the odd feeling will fade away. And you alone cannot ruin a party. You gotta be 2 to tango, Dear. You are imperfect? So what? I am, and our friends too, but you sure are worthy of love and belonging.
paragraphs.name: deda

paragraphs.text: It’s ok. Forgive yourself. If there is truly something for another to forgive, they will do it when they are ready.
paragraphs.name: d7d8
